Address.value: 767 THIRD AVENUE 6TH FLOOR, NEW YORK, New York, 10017, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Acacia Research Corp is engaged in the acquisition, development, and patents technologies through its subsidiaries. It assists patent owners with the prosecution and development of their patent portfolios; protection of their patented inventions from unauthorized use; generation of licensing revenue from users of their patented technologies; and enforcement against unauthorized users of their patented technologies.
